name: Hard split
description:
Hi! Here is Plazmis Games and this is our first experience with Unreal Engine. It was great and fun! We hope you have fun too! For this game jam we create...

First person shooter with split screen mechancs! 

Survive the waves, and have fun!

Gameplay Instructions :

WASD - Move

Mouse for look

Left click - upper screen, Right click - lower screen

Blue enemies hunting orange guy. Orange enemies hunting blue guy

Enemies are exploding, and can damage each other too :)

Survive and have fun!

Game made for Epic Mega Game Jam 2022. Theme is "As above so below"

Premade assets:

Weapon by our team

First person arms from First person template

Sounds from Boom library (special for Epic Mega  Game Jam)
